review_content:
Somewhat hazy golden beer with weak fruity aroma. The taste is slightly bitter with hints of tropical fruits and citrus. 
Can bought in the local supermarket in Jeju.

Can from Korean supermarket in New Malden. Slightly hazy golden orange beer with a thin white head. Nose is pineapple, mango, papaya, funky fruit, grainy. Taste is fruity, pineapple, touch acidic, papaya.

아랫바닥부터 올라오는 희안한 향

음......제주위트에일이 좀 나은가?애매하다..
그래도 4개 9천원대 수입맥주보다 한수위라본다
음...그런데 좀 밍밍하면서도 쓰고 떫은맛이 나네
음........안먹을지도..
4개 9천원대면 끼워 살만하다

A small can from Jason's near NCCU, drunk at home several days ago. Aroma: a grapefruit plantation. Appearance: clear dark amber, generous off-white head. Palate: light-bodied and oily, soft carbonation; astringently bitter finish. Taste: lightly bitter, more citrus, not bad.

(Can) Pours clear golden with small loose white head. Nice aroma, very citrusy - orange especially. Light body, well carbonation, maybe a little fizzy. Pleasant taste.  Nice citrusy start, then biscuity malt, some peppery notes and a pleasant gentle bitter finish. Maybe a little restrained, but very drinkable.
